content: It’s either this or all aliens are introverts.
title: UFO

content: I started doing exercise classes recently, so it’s on my brain. It’s the first time I’ve ever done a class and it’s kicking my butt. I’m coming up on 40 soon, so I have to do some damage control if I want to keep up with my kids, and… oh damn, I’m doing it, aren’t I?
title: Crossfit

content: I always liked the idea of a hard-boiled occult detective story crossed with the adventures of Tintin or The Hardy Boys. “Aw shucks” and unspeakable horrors.
title: Occult Detective Billy

content: This joke was pretty much entirely written by my wife. I don’t really follow pop music, so I wasn’t familiar with the Dave Guetta/Sia song, but the scenario worked for me. Check out the video if you want to hear what Wolvie is rocking out to, and watch what’s basically a mini X-men video.
title: Adamantium

content: Confession time: I worked for Cutco for a summer in college, and it was absolutely soul-crushing. I still have the knives, though. They’re actually pretty nice, which is how they get you.
title: Secret Treasure
